title: palukuTacE
sahitya:
palukuTacE phalamEmi palumAru vEdAntamu


anupallavi

  balamaku kAmAdula cESTalu vadalanivAru cadivi


caraNam    jUpulu bOTulapailO jUpulu parahimsalapai mApu rEpu vittArjana mArgamula narayucunu
E panulaku tAnu durvyApaka mAnasayutulai shrIpati venkaTEshvaruni cittamulO nilpaka ila
